LongDescription: <b><i>Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection</i><br clear=left>[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead<br clear=left>[A] No rush hour service <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b>All times, until Friday May 18, 2018<br><br>[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, <i>approximately every 20 minutes,</i> between <br><b>Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b> and <b>Beach 90 St</b> and via the [A] <i>to/from</i> <b>Far Rockaway-Mott Av</b>.<br><br>[A] Rush hour trains that were scheduled to operate <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Beach will operate<br><i>to/from</i> Euclid Av instead.<br><br>For <b>Broad Channel</b>, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.<br><br><b><i>Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:<br></b></i><a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q52-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q53-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM16</font></a> and <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM17</font></a> service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.<br><br><a href=http://www.mta.info/press-release/nyc-transit/nyc-transit-starting-subway-flood-protection-project-rockaways-next-month target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Click here</font></a> for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.<br><b><br>
